description: Walk Away Waffles serves warm Belgian sugar waffles to the streets of St. Louis! A Belgian sugar waffle is a delicious waffle made with pearl sugar mixed into the dough. In addition to the Classic, there is Apple Cinnamon, Blueberry, Banana, Chocolate, Coconut, Cranberry, Lemon and Pumpkin are some of the favorites. You can also add bacon or sausage baked into your waffle. Served with dipping sauce such as Maple syrup, Blueberry syrup, Strawberry syrup and chocolate sauce. Get one today!
name: Walk Away Waffles
